main event: A high-speed unidentified aerial device was observed in Gravesville, New York, on June 19, 2002.
interesting points: The object was described as greenish yellow and traveling at a very high speed in a straight course before vanishing behind clouds., The Colgate University astronomer evaluated the sighting and suggested it might be a meteor., The device exhibited unusual maneuverability and appeared to flash brightly as it moved., The Gravesville city police intervened during the incident., The report contains redacted information and is part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
witness description: Observations made by an astronomer and possibly other local authorities.
